narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection. 
 
This was the 2nd pre-license inspection and exit briefing for a Class A license was conducted with the applicants.
The applicants will submit a copy of this report along with the license fee to the Regional Office at:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave
Building B, Mail Stop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
